channel.title: briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesHealthOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Tatiana Schlossberg, the granddaughter of JFK, says she has a rare terminal cancer
item.description: In an essay in The New Yorker , Tatiana Schlossberg says she has acute myeloid leukemia. She also criticized her relative, Robert F. Kennedy Jr.

item.title: What foods make you happiest? It's not what you think
item.description: As you prepare for your holiday feast, here's something to consider. Research suggests there are certain foods that can help boost our moods and make ...

item.title: A bowhead whale's DNA offers clues to fight cancer
item.description: Scientists searching for new ways to combat cancer think they may have uncovered a promising new lead in the DNA of the bowhead whale.

item.title: Deck the halls: Research shows decorating can soothe anxiety and bring cheer
item.description: Even if you aren't in the holiday spirit, decorating the tree and making Christmas cookies can trigger feel-good hormones.

item.title: 'Nobody wants to come': What if the U.S. can no longer attract immigrant physicians?
item.description: Immigrants make up a significant proportion of all the country's doctors. New policies are making it harder and less appealing for foreign-born physic...

item.title: Kennedy Sharpens Vaccine Attacks, Without Scientific Backing
item.description: HHS Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. claims that the aluminum ingredients in vaccines cause a variety of harmful reactions, from allergies to autism. S...

item.title: Caída de las tasas de vacunación y de la inmunidad alimentan brotes de tos convulsa
item.description: Texas registró 1.928 casos de tos convulsa en 2024. Para octubre de 2025, el estado ya superaba los 3.500. A nivel nacional, las cifras son igual de a...

item.title: Kids and Teens Go Full Throttle for E-Bikes as Federal Oversight Stalls
item.description: States, counties, and schools step in to improve safety amid an uptick in e-bike injuries, while federal regulatory efforts stagnate.

item.title: Limitados por políticas de Trump, los registros de cáncer solo reconocerán a pacientes como “hombre” o “mujer”

item.title: Una crisis de salud oculta tras los desastres naturales: la proliferación de moho en los hogares
item.description: Se estima que el 47% de los edificios residenciales de Estados Unidos tiene humedad o moho. Así que, aunque la última temporada de huracanes esté por ...
